p: Vero cell line (ATCC, CCL-81) was cultured at 37 °C in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM, Gibco, Grand Island, NY) supplemented with 10% foetal bovine serum (FBS, Gibco, Grand Island, NY) in the atmosphere with 5% CO 2. Cells were digested with 0.25% trypsin and uniformly seeded in 96-well plates with a density of 2 × 10 4 cells/well prior infection or drug feeding. The virus (C-Tan-nCoV Wuhan strain 01) used is a SARS-CoV-2 clinically isolated virus strain. These viruses were propagated in Vero cells.
